flounder.engine

Class FlounderEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.engine.FlounderEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FlounderEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Deals with much of the initializing, updating, and cleaning up of the engine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Carries out initializations for basic engine components like the profiler, display and then the engine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlounderEngine

        public FlounderEngine(IModule module,
                      int displayWidth,
                      int displayHeight,
                      java.lang.String displayTitle,
                      float targetFPS,
                      boolean displayVSync,
                      boolean displayAntialiasing,
                      int displaySamples,
                      boolean displayFullscreen)
        Carries out initializations for basic engine components like the profiler, display and then the engine. Call startEngine(FontType) immediately after this.
        Parameters:
        module - The module for the engine to run off of.
        displayWidth - The window width in pixels.
        displayHeight - The window height in pixels.
        displayTitle - The window title.
        targetFPS - The engines target frames per second.
        displayVSync - If the window will use vSync..
        displayAntialiasing - If OpenGL will use altialiasing.
        displaySamples - How many MFAA samples should be done before swapping display buffers. Zero disables multisampling. GLFW_DONT_CARE means no preference.
        displayFullscreen - If the window will start fullscreen.

    • Method Detail

      • getCamera

        public static ICamera getCamera()
        Returns:
        The engines camera implementation.

        public static IRendererMaster getMasterRenderer()

        public static Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()
        Returns:
        The projection matrix used in the current scene renderObjects.

      • getDelta

        public static float getDelta()

      • getTime

        public static float getTime()

      • startEngine

        public void startEngine(FontType defaultFontType)
        Starts the engine and sets the default family to be used when creating a font. Call closeEngine() immediately after this.
        Parameters:
        defaultFontType - The default font family to use when creating texts, this can be overridden with Text.setFont().

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the engines main game loop. Call closeEngine() right after running to close the engine.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • closeEngine

        public void closeEngine()
        Deals with closing down the engine and all necessary systems. Do not run OpenGL after this.
